Melody

The SASS Layout Engine

Home Getting Started Typography Layouts

This is version 2 of Melody, which is currently under active development. As such, both this site and certain features of the framework may be broken.

If you do find issues, please raise a Github issue, or return to using version 1.

Hello! Melody is designed to allow you to build flexible, responsive layouts while writing as little code as possible. Take a look through the sections on the left to see how it works.
